tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE SoloTravelDestinations (
  destination_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  destination_name VARCHAR(255),
  user_rating FLOAT,
  user_reviews INT,
  travel_preferences VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE user_preferences (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    destination VARCHAR(255),
    budget DECIMAL,
    duration_hrs INT,
    best_season VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE destination_reviews (
    review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    destination VARCHAR(255),
    user_id INT,
    rating DECIMAL,
    review_text TEXT,
    date_posted TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE popular_destinations (
    destination_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    destination VARCHAR(255),
    reviews_count INT,
    average_rating DECIMAL,
    most_visited_season VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE reviews (
    review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    destination_id INT,
    rating FLOAT,
    review_text TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (destination_id) REFERENCES destinations(destination_id)
);

CREATE TABLE users (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10)
);

CREATE TABLE reviews (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    destination_id INT,
    user_id INT,
    rating FLOAT,
    comment TEXT
);
